description: Like many other airlines, the Franco-Dutch group has been badly hit by the coronavirus outbreak.
title: Coronavirus: Air France-KLM secures billions in government aid
title_page: Coronavirus: Air France-KLM secures billions in government aid - BBC News
maintext: "This financing will give us the opportunity to rebuild. Faced with the upheaval the world is going through, we are going to have to rethink our model immediately," he added.
